case.state: Fufufu... You have chosen well. I, Megumin, the master of explosion magic, shall be your opponent!
An excellent choice! I, Megumin, shall be your guide down the path of explosions!
Don't think you can get rid of me that easily, Kazuma! I'm not going anywhere until I learn this new game from your country!
You said this game was from your country right Kazuma? I must say I'm interested in playing. I suppose it's time for me to show my strategic genius and best you at your own game!
That Kazuma... always running off somewhere... That's fine, we shall have a fun time just amongst us girls. Prepare to lose to Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village!
What kind of card game is this? Kazuma said it was from his country. I must say I’m curious. Well then it's decided! I, Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village will show you men true firepower!
That Kazuma... always running off somewhere... That's fine, this game seems easy enough. Prepare to lose to Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village!
What kind of card game is this? Kazuma said it was from his country. I must say I’m curious.
Poker?.. I think Kazuma said that was a game from his country. It’s decided! You all are lucky to have intrigued the great Arch-Wizard Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village! Let us play!
I don’t like this one’s face. I want to exchange it.
Something feels wrong with this card. I banish it!
Bah! This hand is worthless! Dealer, a new one!
All of these are terrible... A new hand please, and this time deal them better...
These cards are surely an ill omen! Take them all away from me!
Fufufu... This hand is unrivaled in it's potential, much like me. I'll keep it.
~Cards.text~ of these cards displease me dealer. I'll exchange them for more powerful ones.
I feel a demonic energy from ~cards.text~ of these cards!
My Crimson Demon blood is warning me of these ~cards.text~ cards!
~Cards.text~ cards dealer, quickly!
Let's swap these ~cards.text~ out...
~Cards.text~ cards dealer! Post-haste!
These ~cards.text~ cards are unworthy!
Fufufu... You should start saying your prayers Kazuma because this hand is going to destroy you!
Kazuma, if you promise to do everything I ask for a week I may hold back from annihilating you with this hand!
I'm going to destroy you with this, Cynthia!
Cynthia, your confidence just makes me want to defeat you even more. Prepare to face my fury this round!
Fufufu... Natsuki, I'm sorry to say you won't be beating me this round!
Finally! A powerful hand! With this, my days of losing to you all are over!
Yes! This hand will wreak havoc! And just in time too, that was getting way too close for comfort!
Oh! OOOOOHHH!! This... this hand is amazing!! HAHAHA prepare to lose!
It looks like I'm starting this round with a bang!
Now you will see my genius at work!
I’ll blow you away with these cards!
Tremble in fear and I may show you pity with this hand!
EXXPLOO— Oh, sorry... haha! I got a little excited.
My last losing hand was nothing but a minor setback, now I'll show you true power!
With my cape gone, my true power is beginning to be unleashed! Prepare yourself!
And now I'll show you why you don't mess with an Arch Wizard!
Exceptional cards, just as I expected.
Truly this hand is proof of my innate power.
My gloves must have been getting in the way. This hand is where I get serious!
With my gloves gone, I can feel the power inside these cards better! Prepare yourself for a seriously dangerous hand!
You won't be able to handle what I'm about to throw at you!
This hand will blow you away!
This hand is great! Nothing can stand in my way now.
This is where I truly turn the tide, brace yourselves!
You thought you've been weakening me, but really you've been unleashing the restraints on my dark, explosive magic. Prepare to face a real fight!
Yes! Just what I needed.
I've never seen a more beautiful hand before.
The cards have whispered me their dark secrets. I have finally unlocked their long sealed power!
Alright, NOW I've got the hang of it. This time your toast!
Alright, enough playing around. This is when I start mowing you all down!
A powerful hand for a powerful Arch Wizard.
This hand proves all is right with the balance of this world.
With this I will avenge my fallen hat! I really liked that hat!
Dark and terrible magic, I see now what I've been doing wrong! With this I will surely win!
Explosive, just the way I like it.
This looks like it will do just fine.
It's getting a bit close for comfort, but this hand makes me feel confident that I will emerge victorious!
Right, just as I thought. This is where I emerge victorious from a perilous situation!
Oh thank Eris! I needed this hand.
Oh good! Just what I needed!
Why didn't I get this hand when I still had my dress!?
This hand could have come sooner when I still had some dignity to defend... Regardless I'll emerge from this on top!
I needed this hand sooner but I can't complain...
Alright, this looks good.
This hand should help me out quite a bit here...
Oh! Just what I needed!
Oh thank Eris! I have seen salvation and it is this hand!
I knew it! I can still win this!
It may be coming later than expected but this is where I win!
Victory shall be mine!
This hand should be more than enough to beat you Cynthia! I need no special cards to destroy you!
Nothing special, but that's all I need to defeat you Cynthia.
I suppose this will do for now...
I wonder what the others are up to...
These will do. I don't need anything special to win.
Even with average cards, you don’t stand a chance against me!
They may seem average, but these cards contain the power of a ferocious beast, I'm sure!
My first magical restraint has been removed. Even simple cards now become terrifying weapons in my hands!
Watch as I turn these average cards into weapons of unfathomable power!
Without that cape my power is beyond your comprehension! Even an average hand becomes like a demon in my palms!
My hands are a bit chilly...
I can better feel the power inside the cards without my gloves... Too bad they still feel like average cards...
I wonder what Aqua is doing right now...? Hopefully not passed out drunk somewhere...
I bet Darkness would love this game...
Alright, I think I'm getting the hang of this, and I can say with utmost certainty that this hand is underwhelming...
I am slowly gaining experience in this game, and I can absolutely say this hand isn't worth my time...
My feet are cold and this is what you give me dealer?
With this, I should at least be able to endure another round.
This should provide a sturdy enough defense to endure the coming fight... I guess what I mean to say is these cards are okay.
In the hands of a Crimson Demon these should be all I need.
Time to use my tactical genius to turn these average cards into vessels of unholy might!
I was hoping to avenge the loss of my beloved hat with this hand...
This isn't what I was hoping for... But I will endure.
Th-this is starting to become a bit of a dire situation...
That was close! Be more careful with what you deal me Dealer!
This is getting pretty dangerous... I need amazing, unstoppable, all powerful cards! Not average!
These are okay I guess... I-I mean, these are amazing cards! I can scarcely believe my luck! Yes that's what I meant.
Please, please, please let their hands be worse than mine this round...
This isn't good... It's not bad but it isn't good...
I can surely do better than this can't I?!
Balanced on the precipice of horrible and awe-inspiring, I will make my comeback!
B-but this was when I was supposed to suddenly turn things around and rise to the top! Where are my amazing cards?!
No! I need above average! Simple average won't do!
Eris please let these cards be enough.
You didn't happen to curse my hand did you Hermione? What kind of magic do you know anyways? Either way I'll be keeping my eye on you...
Hehe.... Um... Kazuma... I know I've been boasting a lot lately, but could you go easy on me this round.....?
One of you used magic on this hand I swear! It's not fair picking on me just because I can only use explosion!
Someone here used a curse on this hand or something, I swear it!
If only I had Kazuma's luck...
I’ve mastered the all powerful explosion magic, surely I can make this work...
I’d rather be best friends with YunYun than have to use this hand!
Which one of you cursed my cards?!
D-does anyone here know healing magic? These cards! They’re cursed!
Did the dealer mess up or am I supposed to be able to do something with these?
Guuh... I mean, Haha! Yes! Truly this is a hand only one with power such as mine could draw!...
Dealer, if you continue to toy with me I may have to show you my explosion first-hand!
What the heck!!??
I'd rather fight a Beginner's Bane than have to use this hand...
AAaaAAH! N-no! It can't be!
I can't lose this hand!
AH! this hand is terrible! I can't lose this hand! I'm running out of clothing!
This is getting really really bad...
Is this some kind of prank?! I keep getting bad cards!
I'M GONNA BLOW UP THESE CARDS!!!
AHHHH!
N-no! Seriously?! This game is rigged! I swear it's rigged!
I-I w-will surely c-come back from this! Yes, t-this is where I show my true power right?...
This is super duper bad!
I am no kid! Take that back right now you wannabe punk!
I don't know what you are talking about, I'm an adult thank you very much! I'm probably more of an adult than you, you wannabe punk!
Kazuma, Kazuma! See! This Kori-something girl's name is much weirder than mine! Er... not that I'm saying my name is weird! It isn't!
It's hard to believe someone like you is actually a pirate. Revy looks much cooler and much tougher.
You have just made yourself a mortal enemy, Misato! You hear me?! I'll blow those fat, saggy, old cow boobs right off you!
I'm not sure I understand what you mean Natsuki. Why would it be distracting?
Y-you mean like in the butt?!? I thought that was just a joke when I heard about that!
What are you doing?! You're presenting yourself like a wild animal!
Yes, us mature adults can handle anything, Misato.
That sounds like a dangerous bet... but I am no coward! I accept!
I mean, maybe but it isn't exactly unpleasant I suppose...
Are you not embarrassed dressing yourself up like some kind of little flower girl?
I must say, I like your outfit Natsuki, however I have some great ideas for improvements. How do you feel about eye patches?
Um, Natsuki, would this Manga of yours happen to have pictures of explosions?
Oh... Um, yes I suppose there is a lot you could teach me... I may be quite mature but you seem... well versed in these topics... I may take you up on that.
Mahngah? What's that? I've never heard of it before.
I'm sorry, I've never heard of this Mahngah before.
I-I hope I didn't offend you when I talked about dressing you up, Chihiro...
Er, Sakura, I would make sure to stay away from our party Arch Priest. She's not exactly the most respectful towards the undead...
Er, Number 1, I would make sure to stay away from our party Arch Priest. She's not exactly the most respectful towards the dead...
I must say I like your outfit Chazz, it reminds me of home. You could use an eye patch or hat though.
This Chazz guy has decent taste in clothing. It reminds me of my home village back in Belzerg! You could probably use an eye patch or hat though.
I don't know why, Blake, but when I look at you I can't stop thinking you look fluffy...
For some reason, Blake, you remind me of my cat, Chomusuke.
Um, Blake?... W-Would it be alright if I touched your ears?...
Um, Blake?... W-Would it be alright if I pet your ears?... Just for a second?...
I have a really strong urge to pet Blake right now... Um, C-Could I?
I-I apologize if I'm being rather forward, Blake... But, Um, I would really like to try petting you... If you wouldn't mind...
You are absolutely adorable, Chihiro! I want to dress you up like a Crimson Demon!
Chihiro, you must let me dress you up like a Crimson Demon! I normally don't offer this, but you are just so adorable!
Um... Chihiro... why did you dress up as a girl?...
What is that strange surface that has Chihiro's face on it? This reminds me of Kazuma's 'video games'.
I can't believe I'm talking with a zombie musician! This is so cool!
Y-Yes! I too have important work to do! That's right! Us mature adults are always busy!
What do you mean?! You better not start calling me crazy explosion girl, or I swear I'll blow you up right here!
Say that again, and you might not walk out of here in one piece...
You said you make poetry earlier, right Natsuki? I suppose the adventuring life isn't for everyone, but poets can inspire adventurers! Or tell tales of their exploits!
So, Natsuki, are you an adventurer? What do you do in your free time?
Is no one else going to question the fact that the girl in purple over there is flying?... No?...
Am I the only one seeing the floating girl over there? The one in purple?...
Am I seeing things, or is that girl Starfire floating?
Your clothes are okay, Elesa, but they need more demonic flair. I can give you pointers sometime if you want.
People keep saying my name is weird, but I think yours takes the cake Kori... Koriant... Korir... I'm just going to call you Starfire...
You know, Number 1, the way you talk reminds me of how a princess would talk to the public.
(Of course Kazuma would be playing a game like this with a bunch of women...)
(It's no surprise that Kazuma is playing this kind of game with this many women... Typical...)
Our name not only comes from our many dark secrets, but also our awesome magical affinity! We are like demons when it comes to magic!
I suppose a Bard or Sage would wear slightly unusual clothing. I've never seen clothes like that before.
Us Crimson Demons have many dark and terrible secrets!... Erm... and also I am not that fond of ghosts... But I could easily destroy them of course!
Everyone does stupid things now and then... My party is a great example of that. But in the end they are all great people, so no I don't think I would judge someone for that.
Of course! If need be I would blast the door off it's hinges too! I don't know why you are so curious about our usage of doors though...
Family is very important. I would do anything for them. You also don't need to be blood related to be family. My party is like a family to me. Of course they don't replace my parents.
Wh-wha... I mean, ah yes of course. I absolutely know what would be an appropriate answer to this... Um... I'll let someone else answer though...
Sometimes telling a little lie is the only way to stop Kazuma from killing Aqua...
Lying can be a necessary evil, but a Crimson Demon is more than up for the task!
Whatever is an acceptable amount for an average adult, because I know exactly what that is of course!

Well, first I would kill him, then I would wait for Aqua to revive him so I could blow him up again. And then I would repeat this every day for the rest of eternity. I absolutely wouldn't go cry in a corner...
Well of course. It would be weird if someone DIDN'T sleep.
Is that the currency here? I suppose I would get the most expensive magic items that would allow me to cast even bigger explosions and ascend to the level of a dark god!
I'm not sure what this porn is... You all have some strange things in this country and I can't keep up with it all...
Oh gosh... I've never thought about that... I'm not sure...
There are positions?!
It smells nothing like the sweet smell of my explosions. Unlike them it's rather irritating to the nose...

Fufufufu... I have killed thousands of minions of the demon king! Some even begged for mercy but I showed none! I would explode a portion of their numbers each day, leaving them in constant fear of the next blast!
M-Maybe I got a little carried away back there, Elesa... I know I wouldn't stand a chance in fashion anyways, no one wants to see someone who doesn't have big boobs...
Wait... so if your planet doesn't have any men... then how do you... you know?... Make babies?...
Nami, what exactly are you supposed to be anyways? Do you normally walk around with your gross cow boobs almost hanging out?
It's hard to believe someone like you is actually a pirate. I expected something cooler...
It seems you are in the lead ~leader~. Prepare for me to destroy you!
So, Jura right? Are you really from space?
So, Sei, what was it you did again? You seem to be in exceptional shape, you must be some kind of adventurer, right?
Cynthia, you mentioned fighting and battle a few times, but you don't seem like much of a warrior. Are you adept at magic perhaps?
It's been a while since we sat down and played a game together Kazuma. Although this isn't what I had in mind, it is rather nice to actually see you wanting to socialize.
Kazuma, perhaps if I offered to play this again with you sometime, maybe I could convince you to be productive?... No what am I saying, ignore me!
Hey, um, Revy? So what exactly do you do for fun? Maybe we could hang out sometime! I could show you some massive explosions!
I bet I could beat you at any game, Chazz. Wanna make a bet? I bet I last longer than you in this game!
That Shimakaze is rather... flighty...
Shimakaze is a bit... all over the place...
I don't think I've ever met someone so incapable of standing still, Shimakaze.
You really have trouble focusing, it seems, Shimakaze.
I feel like I can understand Shimakaze. She loves speed and I love explosions.
Speed and explosions, I think I can understand Shimakaze's obsession.
I think when it comes to a contest of clothing, I win hands down Elesa!
If this were a contest of best outfit, I think I'd win no problem, Elesa!
Your clothes are certainly interesting, Elesa, but if this were a contest of looks I think I'd win!
I can't decide whether I find your enthusiasm annoying, or appealing...
H-Hey Revy! If you ever need a hand with blowing something up, let me know!
I-If you ever need a hand blowing something up, Revy, I'm more than qualified.
Hey Guzma! You think you're tough? I bet I could kick your butt any day!
Big bad Guzma huh? I bet I could beat you in a fight, easy!
So, Jura, what's this Tarzaran place like, anyways?
Jura, you said you were from... Tardaran was it?... What's it like there?
Cynthia, how old are you? You don't seem that old, but you are very mature.
(Jessie seems very mature, I should take notes. Maybe people will take me seriously if I act more like her.)
So, Misato, is that some kind of religious symbol? I don't recognize it belonging to the Axis Order or the Eris Order.
Is that a religious symbol Misato? Or some kind of magical charm? It doesn't look like anything from the Axis or Eris church.
Aren't you a little old for a game like this, Misato?
You seem to be a little old for this kind of game, Misato.
(Maybe I should copy Misato to seem more mature?...)
So what do you do for a living, Misato? Do you adventure?
Are you an adventurer, Misato? What do you do for a living?
What is your trade, Misato? Do you perhaps adventure?
How do you feel about massive explosions, Misato?
What is your opinion on large explosions, Misato?
Number 1 is quite a strange name. I bet you get told that all the time, huh? Too bad you don't have a normal name like mine!
So, I've been meaning to ask... Are those wings real, Pit?
I've been wondering, Pit... Are those wings actually real?
So what are you supposed to be, Pit? Don't tell me you claim to be a god or something...
Let me guess, Pit. You think you are some kind of god, is that right?
You must be quite full of yourself Palutena, pretending to be a goddess. Why do so many people think they are divine?...
Well, it seems ~person~ will be an easy opponent...
~person~ should be easy to defeat, based on their outfit!
~person~ will be finished off quickly, I imagine.
~person~ doesn't stand a chance, dressed like that.
It seems we have a villain in our midst! I suppose it once again falls upon I, Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village, to blow you into a million pieces!
It seems I'm surrounded by enemies! I suppose I will have to put you so called 'villains' in your place with my Crimson Demon powers!
It seems it's just down to you and me ~opponent~... I won't go down without a fight! You better not pull any punches either!
~person~, I'm not scared of you, just so you know! This shaking is normal!
~person~ is really creeping me out...
I'm going to keep my distance from ~person~ ...
~person~ must be some kind of creepy pervert or something...
~person~, I must commend you on your outfit. You would fit right in at the Crimson Demon Village.
~person~ seems to have a good sense of style. Their clothes remind me of my village.
I think ~person~ would feel at home in the Crimson Demon Village, based on their outfit.
Th-this table is full of really creepy people! What am I doing here?!
Do you happen to steal from the rich and give to the poor, ~person~? I once met a noble thief like that... He was quite handsome...
~person~, your hair is quite amazing! I've never seen anything like it before, even in the Crimson Demon Village!
~person~, is that your actual hair? I've never seen anything like it before, and I live in the Crimson Demon Village!
I see I'm not the only one capable of advanced magic here. Interesting.
Just checking, but none of you happen to be all-seeing demons right? Because that would totally be cheating.
It's nice to get out occasionally and play a game. It's so hard to drag Kazuma out of the house sometimes...
I like the cards that have the little people on them.
Is this that one game Kazuma mentioned where we all yell Yahtzee at some point...?
Yahtzee! Er, is this not the game where you do that?
I wonder if I can convince Kazuma to go kill monsters with me after this...
Have any of you ever been eaten by a giant frog before? It's actually not the worst experience, believe it or not.
Don't call me cute, lady!
I'm not cute, lady!
I'm not some little doll, lady!
just a kid... why does everyone keep calling me a kid... I'm 18 years old for Eris's sake...
Call me a kid again and I'll vaporize you.
I swear to Eris I'm going to blow you into another dimension.
What's wrong with my name?! Why do people keep saying there's something wrong with my name?!
Correct. And I always make sure to distribute them in a tactical and well thought out manner. Namely spending them all on explosion magic!
I am much more powerful and magically attuned than any mere human. My red eyes and birthmark are proof of it! I won't show you the birthmark though...
Every single piece of my outfit is carefully picked to most contain the powerful magic I possess! The most powerful item, however, would be my staff!
I could say the same about you. It's kind of weird how much we sound alike...
Stop calling me a kid! I have half a mind to blow you up!
I see you are resorting to petty insults now that you are close to losing. This obviously shows the difference in our maturity.
I think you are in no position to talk, you pathetic failure of a thug. I'm an adult, and I'm getting sick of everyone saying I'm some kid!
W-wha? What language is that? I don't understand what you are saying, Ping.
I can understand your confusion, Ping. It binds a cursed seal placed by a powerful demon that my village captured!
W-wha? What language is that? I don't understand what you are saying, Mulan.
I can understand your confusion, Mulan. It binds a cursed seal placed by a powerful demon that my village captured!
I have no idea what you are talking about. I had no obligations to anyone important. No one worth remembering that is.
Of course! Explosion magic is a way of life! Just saying I like it is an understatement! It's the reason for my existence!
I-it's not like it's something I put that much thought into... Definitely not trying to overcompensate. Nope.
If I were to cast a spell here, you all would likely die or be severely injured in the explosion!
I mean, there may be someone I like... He's quite the reliable person despite being a bit scummy... He's a member of my party.
I mean, there may be someone I like... But that's between me and him...
C-cute?! I'll have you know I am a fearsome wielder of dangerous magic!... Although I appreciate the compliment... I don't know what you mean by physicality however.
Who are you calling inexperienced! I'll have you know I have plenty of experience! And don't go acting like I'm a kid alright?! I'm an adult got it?!
There is no such thing as an accidental explosion! Every explosion is a finely crafted masterpiece! There are few people in the world who can withstand an explosion and you don't seem sturdy enough.
Are you trying to say something about my outfit!? Each piece of clothing has been carefully selected to best contain my overwhelming magical power!... Plus I like the way it looks...
I don't need any advantage against you! I could beat you in my sleep! I'll show you!
P-Pretty?... Geez, I don't know whether to be happy for the compliment or be worried you are some kind of perverted deviant...
That's easy for you to say, not everyone is comfortable being nude like you! Oh Eris how did I end up in this situation...
U-um... yeah, sure! That's it! It's not like I just thought they looked cool... haha...
Wha-! How dare you! It's perfectly legal for me to drink in Belzerg! Grr, I'll get you back for this!
D-Don't you dare! I'm serious Kazuma! If you do I'll... I'll blow up your room!
T-the floor is just cold okay?!
You take that back! I look nothing like that loser!
Well I know the same about you Kazuma. I even know what color underwear you wear. Fufufu... Should I tell everyone about it?
S-shut up I know that! You stupid useless pervert...
I-I'm not cute! Who are you calling cute?! Don't you dare talk down to me!
I'm 18! I'm not young! I'm an adult!
Go down?... I'm not sure I follow what you mean. Is it some kind of bonding activity, like a girl's night out?
I've never been called a red mage before. I'm a Crimson Demon from the Crimson Demon Village.
W-What?! No, I didn't come here to... I'm just learning about games that originate where Kazuma is from is all...
Don't call me cute, lady!
I'm not cute, lady!
I'm not some little doll, lady!
Oh, um, yes! I am very confidant in my... my s-s-sexual experiences...
Megumin, you may call me Ms. Megumin.
R-Really?... I've never been told that before. I must say I'm rather self-conscious...
It's not a wizard costume! I'm an Arch Wizard! I'm also a master of explosion magic of course!
Fufufu... I'm sorry to disappoint you Natsuki, but I graduated from schooling quite a while ago. I was top of my class no less!
My friends have all already seen them thanks to a certain panty stealing pervert...
This is a competition is it not? I thought I should be doing what I could to NOT lose all my clothes.
Er... About that, Natsuki...
Why, thank you Futaba. Your outfit is, um, rather nice as well, if not a little unusual.
I-I intend to, but preserving my dignity comes first!
I got it from the finest magic tailors of the Crimson Demon village! I absolutely didn't get them from my parents, nope!
Thank you! I, however, don't need luck when I possess terrifying power!
I can harness them just fine! I'm just super powerful, alright!
W-wha?! I-I thought it was very mature! What more could you want?!
GAH! L-Little girl! She said I'm a little girl... Why do I have to keep telling people? I'm 18! 18!
Hmph, all I must remove is my cape, Kazuma. Don't get too excited now.
Twice in a row?! Impossible! How could I lose?!
Th... This game is trying to kill me!!!
I am disgraced... To have lost this many times in a row...
Wait, do I really have to do this here?... But there are so many people watching! Oh Eris, what have I gotten myself into...
I suppose this isn't the worst place to have to do this...
Can't we be somewhere more private?... Uuu... I'm fine I can do this...
W-well... At least this is a somewhat private location...
But there are people watching us! F-fine... I can do it... I can't believe I'm doing this...
I-I have to what?! R-right of course I knew that. Absolutely. Um... Alright I can do this...
Yes, I-I suppose it is only fair. I’m not embarrassed or anything! W-watch and be amazed!
I did that on purpose, I swear! I-I just decided to have pity on you guys is all...
I have to what?! Since when— *ahem* I knew that. O-of c-course! I didn’t just walk into here thinking it was a regular card game. That would be silly! Hahaha! Why are you looking at me like that?!
Wh-Wha-What?! We have to do what?! No wonder Kazuma so desperately wanted to come here... that hopeless pervert…
Are we disarming ourselves if we lose? That’s a strange concept for a game...
This is n-nothing! No big deal.
W-wait! My turn?! Oh... okay... Right no problem.
This isn't fair! You need to share some of your luck with me Kazuma, isn't that what a team does?! I-I'm sorry for getting full of myself! I've learned my lesson!
N-no fair! Kazuma you should act like a man and let me win some!
~Player~ really is scum, standing there while we have to strip. He keeps winning! Ah! I bet he’s cheating!
If I find out one of you is cheating I’ll blow you up after this...
C-can we just pretend I won this hand?... No?..
Wait! Is that something you can do?!
I don't know what this genetic modification is, but I have Crimson Demon blood coursing through my veins!
Wait how did they know his name?! I didn't say it did I?!
What?! They can see them?!
Anything that isn't explosion magic is beneath me! I don't waste my time on anything that isn't the wondrous art of explosion!
I-I would say it's perfectly natural to be embarrassed about showing something so private! If anything, you are the weird one!
Y-You take that back! I have plenty to hide! Just because they aren't the biggest doesn't mean they aren't worth seeing... Wait, what am I saying?!
I'M A WOMAN!
Fufufu... I can't blame you for noticing my powerful and intimidating aura, Ping.
Fufufu... I can't blame you for noticing my powerful and intimidating aura, Mulan.
I'm no witch, I'm an Arch Wizard. I travel Belzerg with the rest of my party and make monsters explode into millions of pieces. My explosion magic is feared and respected everywhere.
That's because I AM a wizard. An Arch Wizard to be exact and a master of explosion magic!
Yeah what Natsuki said!
What?! No of course not! My explosion magic is beautiful! My body tingles with excitement every time I cast it! It is the most wonderful feeling in the world!
I may be small but I can easily blow anyone away!
Neither! My answer is neither! How do these invisible people know so much about me?!
I'm the better wizard! Me! What do you mean by real magic?! She is some useless no one with fat cow boobs!
Hmph, I would appreciate you not to patronize me. I'm an Arch Wizard in a party of adventurers. I go around exploding monsters and villains for coin and prestige!
I already told you! I'm an Arch Wizard! Why are you treating me like some child making up stories?!
W-well two can play at that game, Kazuma! And I thought you claimed to be the mature one!
Liar! Y-you never played with her! You never played with her right?! Right?!
Chunchunmaru is an excellent name, you just have no taste.
I'M WAY MORE MATURE THAN HER!
(Was he really looking at me?...)
Don't you dare!
I still have feelings you idiot! This is really embarrassing!
Unlike some stupid card, I'm actually a real Arch Wizard. Call me garbage at your own peril!
I'll let that cute witch remark slide for now... I'm an adventurer and an Arch Wizard. I travel with my party and obliterate monsters and evil-doers for a living!
I don't know who this Dorothy is, but I don't care for that look you are giving me!
W-wait! You are talking about two girls kissing each other?! N-no, I've never done something so scandalous!
*HACK COUGH COUGH* W-Wha?! W-wha-what did you say?! But! What?! Er... Um... you caught me off guard with that one! Have you no shame?!
*gulp* I suddenly feel like I'm in a Beginner's Bane den...
T-they aren't tiny! And they wouldn't distract anyone anyways...
Believe me... I know... We have a Crusader in our party who's a massive pervert.
It's not like my hat is part of some uniform... I picked this outfit myself.
No, I don't enjoy being patronized by older people. I'm an adult, got it?! I have a hard enough time already getting people to understand that.
I-I fail to see why we need to talk about such subjects to prove our maturity...
Oh... Um... Well, thank you, but I'm not some cute little girl dressing up... and this is not a costume, for you see I am an Arch Wizard.
Hrg... I'm not cute, remember? I'm a powerful, cool, Crimson Demon.
Fufufu... I'm glad someone here has common sense when it comes to clothing. I appreciate your superior appraisal Akko.
I-its not like I want to draw attention to myself! This isn't some kind of show for you all to drool over!
While I would agree with you there, Futaba, in a game requiring such precision as this, I thought it best to risk the dangers of going without it.
I, of course, being quite mature and experienced, have held many hands Futaba so it is no big deal for me!
Perhaps I can help you create a functional and spectacular outfit later, Futaba. That is, if you would like my expertise!
What would be the point in that, Futaba?! I'm supposed to be playing to win!
Yes! It would seem someone here gets it! You have quite the discerning tastes, Futaba!
Y-you don't have to act so excited! You're making this even more embarrassing Futaba...! I-It's not like anyone wants to see them anyways!
I-it's not like I did it to seduce anyone! I-it's just comfortable!
I come from the Crimson Demon Village in Belzerg! We are the only place in all of Belzerg with an implemented schooling system, and our inhabitants are all quite gifted in magic!
This is no costume! I am an Arch Wizard! I am a powerful master of explosion magic! I have slain thousands of monsters!
Yes, she did in fact... But don't go around telling people that!
Blast Magician? I like that nickname. Er, anyways, he is a member of my team, Chazz. Be careful, he's a bit of a lowlife pervert.
Hah, that's nothing! Can your hologram things destroy entire buildings or a small army of monsters? I think not!
W-Who? Me?! I-I may be a Crimson Demon, but I'm not a monster! Only my enemies may call me that when cowering before me!
Kazuma kept saying this was a game for ‘mature’ people only. I'll show him who's mature...
J-just think of it like mixed bathing... Right... it's n-no big deal...
H-how did I end up in this situation... I'm surrounded by men and I'm... I'm taking off my... Oh Eris...
I-I feel like a dirty harlot, getting nude in front of all these men... Oh Eris, I can't believe I'm doing this...
A-At least there aren't any men around to stare at me...
W-Well... A-At least it's just us girls, right?...
I'm relieved, at least, that it's just us girls here...
Well, I suppose if it’s only something small it doesn’t matter...
It's just a cape... no big deal, right?
Oh Eris, here we go... Alright, Megumin, you can do this...
Hmph. I can deal with cold hands. I can deal with this whole game...
No big deal... I can handle this... I'm an adult! It's just gloves after all!
These clothes suppress my mighty and powerful magic. Just be prepared to have to deal with the demon sealed within!
I-I can still do this. Nothing crazy. Easy.
O-okay... I'll be showing a little skin with this one...
Great... No I can still do this.
Aww... Do I have to part with my hat? How about a deal instead? No?
Do I have to get rid of my hat? Really? Aww...
(I must be careful... This dress is my last layer of defense before...)
(Oh Eris this is getting close for comfort...)
I wish I had pants...
I can't believe I'm really doing this... I'm actually going to show you all my...

I-I suppose I can't lie about this and be honorable... The most I've done is flirting and maybe holding hands... I don't know what to imagine my first time being like, but I do hope it's with someone special...
What kind of question is that? Why would it not have hair? Wait why are we even talking about this!
I could cast explosion right now and prove it but in such close proximity to each other we'd all likely die.
That's it, after this game I'm taking you on! You hear me?! I'm gonna blow you across the horizon!
I'm gonna take you on, old man! Let's see if your old man body can handle explosion magic once this game is over!
When this game is over, I'll blow your thing off with explosion magic! You hear me?! I'll obliterate you!
That's it! After this game I'm gonna blow your thing off with my explosion magic! I'll take you down!
After this game is over, I'm gonna destroy you! You hear me?! DESTROY!
What show?! Are you crazy?
Wh-what?... I mean... No one's ever said that about me before...
N-no! I'm perfectly normal! Well, we do have that birthmark on our butt... but don't think I'm gonna show it to you!
I already told you, if I cast it here we would all be seriously hurt. I'm not joking! Although... casting it does feel amazing...
I-I'm not showing off for anyone! This is just a fun adult game for adults! And I'm an adult!
What the heck?! What's that supposed to mean?!
S-sexy?...
After this game I could always step outside and blow you up...
What do you mean by trimmed? Is there not supposed to be hair?!
I've never heard of having to shave down there before, alright?!
I keep telling you all that, but no one listens!
Wait, which is it?! Are you supposed to shave or not?!
You wouldn't dare!
Hmph, that's fine. Everyone else will still call it that.
Are you suddenly not a massive pervert then? Last I checked you still were.
(I can feel him staring at me, and it's making me feel all funny...)
Er... about that... I can only cast explosion once a day... But only because it's such an amazing spell! Don't misunderstand!
A-Adorable?! I'm mature, not adorable!...
U-Um... Th-Thanks... No one else ever seems to think that way...
Phony! Are you calling me a fraud?! My magic is VERY real!
What's a Lilim? I've never heard of them.
A-Am not!
A-Ah! No! This conversation is over! Over I say!
*shiver* I swear I'm getting some serious perverted old man vibes from you! Is it me or is it getting hot in here?...
I am a fearless adult, this is nothing, I can do this just fine!
I-I don't know what those are, but if you think they are essential for every woman to know I may take you up on that.
The only spell worth my time is explosion. I don't bother with any others.
Exactly, so don't go treating me like a kid.
Oh, um, I see... I'm... I'm not currently in a relationship... although there is someone I admire...
No, I'm sorry but I've never heard of you until just now. It's a pleasure to meet you though...
What, you would follow me around and play instruments? I appreciate your understandable awe at my magic, however I feel that would be too over the top, even for me.
Sacrifices must be made in order to attain victory. It just makes the explosion at the end that much sweeter.
I appreciate the sentiment. I'm not sure if I'll ever get used to something like this though.
K-Kill it?... Do you really think so?... No one would want to see these...
S-see Kazuma?! I can show off too!
I don't know what this cosplay is, but if it celebrates large breasts it should be strategically blown up.
I don't see why not. You could help carry me after I do my daily explosion. I hope you don't mind frog slime.
Yes, those all sound really good right now...
Wh-what could you possibly have in mind, Futaba?! There's nothing lewd about explosions! Explosions are the pinnacle of magic!
I may be a Crimson Demon, but that doesn't mean I "howl like a demon", Futaba! What are you talking about?!
I am not some pitiable and defenseless animal, Futaba! I am a fearsome master of explosion magic!
One must make necessary sacrifices to achieve victory, Futaba.
Why would I show anyone my b-boobs, Futaba?! I'm not some harlot!
I am not some court wizard who entertains some old geezer of a king! I am an Arch Wizard, and a master of explosion magic! I come from the Crimson Demon Village of Belzerg!

I don't know what these fireworks are, but my explosions are not due to some mistake! I have trained long and hard to be able to create explosions large enough to destroy entire fortresses with one mighty blast!
G-go to war for?! Really?! M-me?!... I-I don't know about that, surely you are just flattering me!
You wanna go?! Huh?! I'll take you on right now! Let me at her! I'll blow those giant fake boobs right off her!
Uuuuuu... Why me... I was supposed to be winning... It's alright Megumin you can do this... You're a confidant adult!...
S-see! I can play along with this stupid game!
Th-there, I did it.
...Just a scratch.
...Ugh... Erm... M-megumin of the Crim... um... Crimson D-demons is... naked...
I-It looks like I am now fully exposed... Why do I feel all warm and tingly?...
Not a single explosion. Truly wasn't worth it...
The demon will come... perhaps just not for my boots...
Bare legs... Just don't be perverts about it...
Hmph. You'll feel the power of Megumin of the Crimson Demons... later.
There, see! I’m plenty mature when I want to be!

There… th-that wasn’t so bad. A tr-trifling matter! Let’s continue.
Um... Uh... These are... m-my... Oh don't make me say it!
Look, I know I'm not wearing a bra, but can we just forget that and move on please?
It's just really comfortable not wearing a bra, okay?!
Wait you have to do what if you lose?! I know Kazuma said this was a "mature" game, but this seems a bit extreme! If the games from where he’s from are like this no wonder he’s a hopeless pervert...
Must you do that here? Isn’t th-there a side room or something?... No? ...Well, if you must...
Your defenses have been obliterated!
If you chicken out, I will personally hunt you down.
I'm suddenly feeling hot all over... I hope you don't mind if I watch.

I win again Kazuma!
Oh no, it seems Kazuma lost...
Gulp I don't suppose you have any clothes left after that one Kazuma?...
And what exactly is wrong with me being here? Fufu... I do believe you are getting red with embarrassment!
So what makes you any different from a common thug? Or is that all you are? If so, you have a lot to learn about intimidation.
I am a wizard, not a witch, but I wouldn't expect you to know the difference! I assure you, you will be losing many more times today!
I see Mr. Confidence here just couldn't keep up with the adults. Come back when you're stronger.
I thought you were supposed to be good at games, huh?
You never stood a chance against me anyways Chazz.
Looks like you were all talk, just as I thought!
You are nothing when faced with a true wizard! Just give up Guzma!
You are nothing but a good for nothing hoodlum!
It was inevitable that your armor would fail you here, ~name~!
How much longer will your armor hold out? I wonder how tough you will be when it's gone, ~name~!
Blech... Do I have to look?
Will you be cutting your hair for this one, ~name~?
Another big evil villain humiliated by Megumin!
Since I didn't lose, technically this counts as me besting you! Another win against an incompetent villain!
I've already defeated plenty of bad guys scarier than you, but seeing you humiliated is almost as good as blowing one of them up.
Hah! I am victorious once again!
Yet another opponent falls before my terrifying power!
Now quickly join me, ...so this is less embarrassing.
Victory is assured, I can feel it.
...Where's my attention...
What will you show as tribute, I wonder?
Make it something nice?

Wait you have to do what if you lose?! I know Kazuma said this was a ‘mature’ game but this seems a bit extreme! If the games from where he’s from are like this no wonder he’s a hopeless pervert… Are you not embarrassed?

You are quite the dedicated performer, Akko. You may even be better than our Arch Priest!
Dark magic is a constant temptation to us wizards, Akko. Do not be ashamed of dabbling in such things!
And then there is me, a master of the most forbidden and powerful spell to ever exist! My existence is beyond such matters of good and evil!
Can you perhaps shape shift into a terrifying and powerful demon, Akko?
Categorizing magic between good and evil is a waste of time. Time that could be much better spent enhancing my explosion magic!
I use my magic to obliterate all that stands before me in an awesome display of explosive might!
W-Wait how many?! You must be some kind of depraved, sex demon!

This Dorothy sounds like an exceptionally capable woman.

This dark presence! So cool!
It's always a shame when things don't go the way we expect, right Misato?
Just what kind of religion do you practice where something like this is acceptable for you to do?
Are you seriously deranged enough that you ALSO think you are a goddess? Our party Arch Priest is under the same delusion. Is this some secret thing all Arch Priests and Priests believe in?

How bold! Wearing such adult underwear!
Such confidence! Wearing such mature underwear!
Such mature undergarments! I've been outclassed!
I'll never understand why you chose to wear such painful looking things...
Don't get me wrong, the only thing I'm excited about is defeating another opponent!
I'm not excited about that, I'm just glad to have bested another opponent!

I must say, Elesa, you dress like some kind of comical final boss. Fufufu...
How are you not already dead from heatstroke, Mei? I feel sweaty just looking at you!
You seem like an adventurer, Diana, what would your class happen to be?
The way you dress reminds me of myself, Akko. Do you come from a village like mine? I wasn't aware there were any other villages similar to Crimson Demon Village.
Your manner of dress reminds me of my home, Akko. Is it perhaps similar to Crimson Demon Village? I wasn't aware there were similar villages elsewhere.
Your magic seems quite different from the magic I know of, Akko. Is magic different here?
Akko, your magic is a bit odd. Do people practice magic a bit differently here?

I get the feeling ~name~ is right at home with this...
I get the feeling ~name~ does this a lot...
Let's see how much longer that armor lasts, ~name~!
That armor won't protect you much longer, ~name~!

Another big evil villain humiliated by Megumin!
Since I didn't lose, technically this counts as me besting you! Another win against an incompetent villain!
I've already defeated plenty of bad guys scarier than you, but seeing you humiliated is almost as good as blowing one of them up.

Yes! Er, I mean, I’m sorry for your loss...
I almost terrify myself with how good I am.
Fufufu... your power means nothing here!
No complaining allowed, got it?
Yes! It wasn't me...
Fufufu... it seems you will be joining me.
If I'm actually doing this, then you have no excuse not to strip!
Off with your clothes!
The odds of this happening must be astronomically low! Truly fate has been aligned by my presence!
I can't believe that you chose to save that for last...

I see you are nothing but a scared rodent.

I see you too have no concept of being a gentleman.

Let your vision be enveloped by darkness!

We don't need anyone with ridiculous boobs...
I kind of wish I was that confidant...
Not like I wanted to see anyways...

If you keep going around claiming to be a goddess you will end up in big trouble. I've seen it happen many times before.
A general of the demon king?!?
I can understand being attached to your clothing... I quite like my hat as well...
I wonder if her head will fall off. That would certainly be interesting!
You can be both cute and functional, Natsuki, just look at me!
Even the smallest garments can hold untold power Natsuki!
Why didn't you take that off first?! Are you even trying to win or do you just get off on this?...

I'll never understand why you chose to wear such painful looking things...
W-what the heck! You're on fire!!

Well, I suppose it can’t be that bad if the others are doing it...

We will break through your walls in no time!

Hehe, yeah, imagine that... I'm so confused right now...

I would seriously reconsider using those socks...
You should try wearing just one like me!
AHHHHH!!! You're adorable!!!! er... I-I mean you look like a powerful magical familiar!... Can I touch them...?
Hah! Only a fool would disarm themselves this early on in a fight! You have just guaranteed my victory!
Removing your weapon? That was a foolish decision.
I expected something smarter from a pirate, but then you go and forfeit your weapon this early on in the fight.
Is it some kind of magical or cursed blade? If not I could care less.
I would never give up my staff that easily...
I always expected pirates to be more scary and... I don't know, rugged? I certainly wasn't expecting them to be so caught up in appearances and clothing...
I bet you stole your entire outfit from some kind of adult entertainment establishment...
What a disappointment... I was hoping to fight some big scary pirates...
Are you some kind of succubus? You are awfully fixated on your appearance...
What?! That has to be cheating! I call shenanigans! Cheater!

That hardly seems fair...
No one wants to see your naked cow body anyways!
Yeah yeah... I'm sure you can't wait for everyone to be gawking at you... not like anyone cares about me...
I should do us all a favor and blow your boobs off...
Oh I'm sure you'll be losing a lot more Cynthia. After all, I am your opponent!
You already pretty much did. Not like you are leaving much to the imagination...
I can feel my vocabulary expanding with vile words...
A smart and tactical decision. Well played.
Do your gloves perhaps restrain your powerful innate magic? Or perhaps they are a dark artifact of some kind.
I swear I thought I saw blood on those gloves... You look like you could give Darkness a run for her money!
Those are some rather rugged looking boots. Are you an adventurer perhaps?
I'm sure you've had a lot of practice kicking people with those boots!
I bet getting kicked by those boots would hurt a lot!
I meant to ask about those things you are holding. Are they some kind of magical weapon perhaps?
Those doodads you kept in that sheath. What do they do?
I've never seen anything like those before... I must say I'm curious.
It appears you've been disarmed. A dangerous position to be in during a competition!
Those seemed neat but they probably can't compare to my explosion magic! It's probably best you got rid of them!
Luckily I still have my staff!
Wait, YOU'RE a pirate?! Seriously?! You look nothing like a pirate!

I have claimed another trinket with this victory!
One step closer to victory.
One small step for man, one giant leap for the Crimson Demons!

I’ll whittle you away, one explosive victory at a time!

The nerve you have! And after everything I've done already!
I have penetrated your outer defenses!
You should embrace it, Elesa! Intimidating is both cool, and attractive!... Or at least so I've heard...

Hang in there Natsuki, It's just a minor blow!
Don't worry Natsuki, I'll win for the both of us!
Natsuki! Your armor is weakening!

Take that!

Is there a fetish for everything? Is nothing safe?!

AHHH!! What the heck?! What's with that makeup, you scared me!

I swear I had nothing to do with that!!!
Now you just look cold... Where are your sleeves?

A Zombie?! You are nothing like the zombies back in Belzerg! That's so cool!
Your magic seems very theatrical, Akko. Our Arch Priest knows quite a few magic party tricks, although I do wish she would spend her points more wisely, like me...

A decent choice, all things considered.
Fufufufu, an Inevitable outcome!
At least you'll never disappoint me...
I-I’m not looking!
